function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate and exaggerated information about COVID-19","Impact":"Misinformation can lead to ineffective containment and mitigation methods, and hamper response to future pandemics.","Mitigation":"Promote open data sharing, verify information with unbiased data, and establish high evidence standards.","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms, diagnostic testing technologies","People":"Public, policymakers, scientists, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Public health organizations, governments, scientific community"},{"Description":"Lack of accurate evidence and data sharing","Impact":"Inability to settle essential questions about transmission, immunity, and effectiveness of containment methods, leading to inadequate preparation for future pandemics.","Mitigation":"Open data sharing, unbiased data collection, prevalence studies, and randomized trials.","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms, diagnostic testing technologies","People":"Public, policymakers, scientists, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Public health organizations, governments, scientific community"},{"Description":"Overreaction and exaggeration of the seriousness of COVID-19","Impact":"Damaged reputation of science, public health, media, and policymakers, leading to disbelief and ineffective response to future pandemics.","Mitigation":"Establish high evidence standards, avoid exaggeration, and verify information with unbiased data.","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms, verification tools","People":"Public, policymakers, scientists, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Public health organizations, governments, scientific community"}]}
